For issues about the *JNAerator* or the *JavaCL Generator*, please go to [http://code.google.com/p/jnaerator/issues/ JNAerator's issue tracker].

For all other issues (*JavaCL*, *ScalaCL*, *BridJ*...), please use [http://code.google.com/p/nativelibs4java/issues/ NativeLibs4Java's issue tracker]
